author: apsallid
body:
#### PR description:

Due to the python3 migration and a number of PRs, the scripts used for the regular validation report are updated. Specifically: 

1. The links in the summary webpage are broken due to deprecation of multiclusters  (PR [#33488](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33488)) , tweaks in the basic plotting script (PR [#33639](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33639))  and reorganization of the layer cluster plots in sub-folders (PR [#33063](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33063)) . 
2. Due to PRs [#33488](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33488), [#33639](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33639) the basic `hgcalPerformanceValidation.py` script options needed renaming. 
3. Due to PR [#34311](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34311) purities are defined and introduced to `html.py`.

#### PR validation:

We have used these scripts to create the validation report for the ongoing `12_0_0_pre4_phase2`  campaign.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This is not a backport.

@rovere @felicepantaleo @lecriste @ebrondol
title: [HGCAL] Updates on the RelVal campaign scripts due to python3 and other PRs
